data.text: Excellent topic of discussion. I am low carb and vegan. Crossing the US -4500 miles. It is very very hard!!! Especially when often all there is along the way are quick stops to buy ‚Äúfuel‚Äù. Nuts are my go-to, and V8. I have succumbed to eating eggs as you can often find them peeled in packages of two. Would love to know what others fuel up with, that can be easily found along roadside stores.
